DD-MM-YYYY [with dash or slash as spacer]
Checks that:
1) The year is numeric and starts with 18, 19 or 20 [from 1800 to 2099].
2) The month is numeric and between 01-12.
3) a) The day is numeric and between 01-28.
b) 29 if the month is 02 in leap years [divisible 4, don´t divisible by 100 and divisible by 400, in this order - e.g.: 2000 and 2012, but not 1900].
c) 30 if the month is anything other than 02.
d) 31 if the month is 01, 03, 05, 07, 08, 10, or 12.
author: tales.ebner
